com.github.harverst.roper.model

Interface ScoreComponent<P>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicScoreComponent, DivisiveScoreComponent, MultiplicativeScoreComponent

    public interface ScoreComponent<P>
    A ScoreComponent is combined with other score components to form a score. The parameter P is used by a PhaseOrder object to manage the order in which the components are applied

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int composite(int oldValue)
      Accepts the current score and returns the composited score.
      P getPhase()
      Used for implementation of Comparable.

    • Method Detail

      • getPhase

        P getPhase()
        Used for implementation of Comparable.
        Returns:
        the phase during which the component is applied

      • composite

        int composite(int oldValue)
        Accepts the current score and returns the composited score.
        Parameters:
        oldValue - the score not including this component
        Returns:
        the score after including this component
